name: Multi-Timeframe Technical Confluence
question: Which stocks show technical signal confluence across multiple timeframes?
retailQuestion: Which stocks show strong signals across all time periods?
description: Analyzes technical signals across daily, weekly, and monthly timeframes to identify high-probability setups with multi-timeframe confluence. Examines trend alignment, support/resistance levels, and momentum indicators for comprehensive signal validation.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for multi-timeframe technical analysis
Step 2: Get historical price data across multiple timeframes (daily, weekly, monthly)
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for multi-timeframe signal assessment
Step 4: Analyze technical signals across timeframes and calculate confluence scores with trend alignment
Step 5: Rank stocks by multi-timeframe confluence strength and signal alignment
